Question: After declining to disclose his financial information, this person was denied an injunction on August 2.
Hints: In the New York market The ____ Show was the highest-rated morning program for seven consecutive years between 1994 and 2001.
In the same month, Time magazine included this person in its Time 100 list.
This person was hired full-time in 1977 and worked a four-hour midday shift, six days per week on a $96 weekly salary.
